articles.title: Why is Artificial Intelligence so Energy Hungry? - Analytics Insight
articles.description: The high energy consumption of artificial intelligence models, especially in neural network training (e.g. BERT) leads to huge carbon footprint. Spiking Neural network (SNN) has been proposed to start age of Green AI.
articles.content: Artificial intelligence (AI) systems today are still far from replicating true human intelligence. But, they are certainly getting better at discerning data patterns and mining insights, to a degree … [+6327 chars]
